resources.string: "Women who drink daily are at greater risk of breast cancer"
The estimated economic cost of alcohol abuse was $184.6 billion for 1998
The death toll exacted by alcohol is not especially heavy among young people
Alcohol is the leading cause of death among European men aged 15 to 29
Alcohol does not contribute to acts of violence
Alcohol is a significant factor in domestic violence and sexual assault
Prolonged misuse of alcohol can also lead to cancer
I will not get sick if I abuse alcohol
